It belongs to the Acanthaceae family and is characterized by its small, tubular flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink or purple. The plant has a compact growth habit with narrow, lance-shaped leaves that are covered in fine, hairy textures. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare species with conservation concerns.
